recipe.title: PB&J Overnight Oats Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ⅔ cup ; milk, of your choice ; (160 mL)
½ cup ; vanilla greek yogurt ; (120 g)

steps.step: In a mason jar or sealable container, add the oats, milk, yogurt, jam, nut butter, vanilla extract, chia seeds, and strawberries, and stir together.
Seal and place in the refrigerator overnight for up to five days.
Top with additional strawberries, if desired.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a mason jar or sealable container, add the oats, milk, yogurt, jam, nut butter, vanilla extract, chia seeds, and strawberries, and stir together.
Seal and place in the refrigerator overnight for up to five days.
Top with additional strawberries, if desired.
